name: Parcour Messacre
description:
The goal seems simple, survive up top for as long as you can without falling

I'll be honest, this game isn't good at all. I got the feedback from people saying that the game was too easy, because you could just stay on the bouncy balls and survive that way.  Along with that I got the comments that the platforms were a bit too random, which just made the game worse to play. I tried to make the game work a little better by having the bouncy balls dissapear like some platforms, and place more platforms in general, but honestly I'm not proud of this one.
